scripts.build: bun run scripts/build/*.{ts,js} && bash scripts/build/*.sh && bun build src/ts/index.ts --outdir=public/assets/js --minify --target=browser && bunx tailwindcss -i src/css/styles.css -o public/assets/css/styles.css --minify
scripts.lint: bun audit && bunx eslint 'src/**/*.ts' --max-warnings=0 && bunx stylelint 'src/css/**/*.css' && bunx htmlhint 'public/**/*.html' && bunx prettier --check './**/*.{ts,css,html,json}'
